attributes.additional_details: The footage has been a place where many students come to every day of the week. Some even just for a chat and a Diet Coke at lunch time. It’s provided a safe space for students to socialise and meet some friends for life: this place is also the equivalent as an SU for RNCM students as the ‘SU’ at RNCM, also serves as a concert as well !
attributes.background: It’s recently been announced that footage will be closing in May. There is a problem with the roof, and I think we could do something about this

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local venues are a matter for their operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
